tag_list: private-school, children-with-autism, asperger, down-syndrome, mental-retardation, special-needs-children, plano, texas
overview: Focus on the Future Training Center is a highly regarded private school in Plano, Texas for students ages 3 to 21, with Autism and other developmental disorders. We offer some of the best Autism early intervention in the country, as well as unique individualized curriculums featuring Speech Therapy, Occupational Therapy, Music instruction based on Speech Therapy principles, and Art instruction based on Occupational Therapy principles to name a few of the approaches we use to individualize our curriculums.
